title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Press Kit
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Press Kit              Press Kit       Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area Fact Sheet -- provides a general overview of the national recreation area and our unique ownership structure. Anthony C. Beilenson Interagency Visitor Fact Sheet -- details about the history, cost, and environmental sustainability of our new visitor center in the heart of the Santa Monica Mountains. Carnivores Fact Sheet -- what scientists have learned about the challenges facing local mountain lions and bobcats. Aquatic Amphibians Fact Sheet -- what species live within the national recreation area and what is being done to conserve them?
